Package pgui.win

Class Palette

java.lang.Object
pgui.type.Palette
public class Palette extends Object
A datatype for storing and accessing a colour palette. This class is used for organising different colours associated with an object into one class Each Window has its own colour palette. This palette is transferred to each Element within the window.
